mapper.select: SELECT EZC_FREQ_TXT.FREQ_TXT_CD AS freqTxtCd /* 상용구 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_FREQ_TXT.FREQ_TXT_CLASS AS freqTxtClass /* 상용구 분류, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FREQ_TXT.FREQ_TXT AS freqTxt /* 상용구, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_FREQ_TXT.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FREQ_TXT.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_FREQ_TXT.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FREQ_TXT.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_FREQ_TXT /* 상용구 관리 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_FREQ_TXT.FREQ_TXT_CD = #{freqTxtCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 상용구 코드, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_FREQ_TXT_PK(P),SYS_C0011455(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_FREQ_TXT /* 상용구 관리 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_FREQ_TXT.FREQ_TXT_CD = #{freqTxtCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 상용구 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_FREQ_TXT.FREQ_TXT_CLASS = #{freqTxtClass, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상용구 분류, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FREQ_TXT.FREQ_TXT LIKE '%' || #{freqTxt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 상용구, VARCHAR2(1000) */
AND EZC_FREQ_TXT.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FREQ_TXT.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_FREQ_TXT.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FREQ_TXT.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_FREQ_TXT.FREQ_TXT_CD AS freqTxtCd /* 상용구 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_FREQ_TXT.FREQ_TXT_CLASS AS freqTxtClass /* 상용구 분류, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FREQ_TXT.FREQ_TXT AS freqTxt /* 상용구, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_FREQ_TXT.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FREQ_TXT.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_FREQ_TXT.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FREQ_TXT.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_FREQ_TXT /* 상용구 관리 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_FREQ_TXT.FREQ_TXT_CD = #{freqTxtCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 상용구 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_FREQ_TXT.FREQ_TXT_CLASS = #{freqTxtClass, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상용구 분류, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_FREQ_TXT.FREQ_TXT LIKE '%' || #{freqTxt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 상용구, VARCHAR2(1000) */
AND EZC_FREQ_TXT.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FREQ_TXT.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_FREQ_TXT.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_FREQ_TXT.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_FREQ_TXT.FREQ_TXT_CD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_FREQ_TXT SET /* 상용구 관리 */ FREQ_TXT_CLASS = #{freqTxtClass, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상용구 분류, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,FREQ_TXT = #{freqTxt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상용구, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND FREQ_TXT_CD = #{freqTxtCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 상용구 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_FREQ_TXT /* 상용구 관리 */ WHERE 1=1 AND FREQ_TXT_CD = #{freqTxtCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 상용구 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
